text:
ALABAMA EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION COMMISSION
BIRMINGHAM 5. ALABAMA
June 10, 1963
Mr, William Harley
President
national Association of Educational Iroadcastera
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, 6, D.C.
Dear Bill,
This is to acknowledge your May 28th letter
appointing me to fill the balance of the term
left by former AAUW Public Relations representative
Frances Butler.
It will be a pleasure to again to serve on the
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Public Relations Committee.
By copy of this letter I am requesting the Mrs.
Marion Corwell send minutes of the last national PR
NAE1 meeting so that I can be briefed on the current
status of the Committee.
Regards.
mmSm
MWLili
Louis Peneguy, Director,
